\n**Advanced Piece**\n<br>\nUse this pie:
**Advanced Piece**
Use this piece if you are unsure which connection to use beforehand, such as when the connection external ID is sent through a webhook message. **Notes:** - You can retrieve the external ID from the connection settings page by hovering over the connection name. - Use this action to retrieve connection values by their external IDs from this project. - After testing the step, you can use the dynamic value in the piece by clicking (X) and referring to this step.
